summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Solana Soldier Telegram bot MVP. All backend APIs working perfectly, frontend fully functional with proper branding and navigation. Telegram bot is running and connected.

minor_issues.issue: RuntimeError in event loop when handling commands (asyncio loop conflict)
minor_issues.impact: Bot still functional but may have occasional command processing issues
minor_issues.details: Event loop conflict in telegram bot thread, but bot continues to poll and respond

passed_tests: Backend API /api/stats returns user statistics with all required fields
Backend API /api/whales returns 9 tracked whale wallets
Backend API /api/sol-price returns current SOL price ($116.41)
Backend API /api/users returns user list (empty but functional)
Backend API /api/trades returns trades list (empty but functional)
Backend API /api/payments returns payments list (empty but functional)
Frontend landing page loads with correct 'SOLANA SOLDIER' branding
Frontend 'Launch Bot' button present and clickable
Frontend features section shows all 4 feature cards
Frontend tracked whale wallets section shows all 5 whale cards
Frontend pricing section shows Â£100/day with SOL/ETH/BTC payment options
Frontend dashboard shows all 4 stat cards (Total Users, Active Wallets, Total Trades, Total Profit)
Frontend dashboard has all 4 tabs (Overview, Users, Trades, Payments)
Frontend dashboard shows SOL price in header ($116.48)
Telegram bot is running and polling for updates
